bibl.title: Una disputa tra due riviste sull'Epitafio di Iperide.
bibl.note: Discusses the terms of a dispute between two magazines (the Greek Ἀστὴρ τῆς Ἀνατολῆς and the English Literary Gazette) about the origin and the authenticity of the roll containing the Epitaphius [P. lit. Lond. 133 (= M.-P.3 1236; LDAB 2424)]. - Pp. 254-255: Appendice. Ἀστὴρ τῆς Ἀνατολῆς (sabbato 30 settembre 1861). Il famigerato Simonidis in Inghilterra.
bibl.seg: OTRANTO Rosa, Una disputa tra due riviste sull'Epitafio di Iperide.

Discusses the terms of a dispute between two magazines (the Greek Ἀστὴρ τῆς Ἀνατολῆς and the English Literary Gazette) about the origin and the authenticity of the roll containing the Epitaphius [P. lit. Lond. 133 (= M.-P.3 1236; LDAB 2424)]. - Pp. 254-255: Appendice. Ἀστὴρ τῆς Ἀνατολῆς (sabbato 30 settembre 1861). Il famigerato Simonidis in Inghilterra.
